documents.document:
Go Flick Yourself

Right now you’re like an ostrich with its head in the sand. If you’re even remotely up to date on current events, then you should know that climate change is real, and it’s happening right now. Don’t wait for your government to go ahead and make changes. Don’t wait for big corporations to pitch in and change. Change what you are in control of changing. Focus on the simple, doable tasks. The actions are small, but they make waves that ripple far and affect others.

waters

I float amongst the unknown,
I feel abandoned,
My hair wet, resting on the black washed waters.

I thought to myself
was I a drift amongst the rivers
The lakes,
Or even the ocean?
Or was I drifting amongst the stars?

I felt alone
Life amidst far could not locate
But the blackness that surrounds me
ingulfs what left of my life force

So I stare at the stars
Thinking, what tiny bit of my memories could arose,
What life would take me
As I afloat in this wet marshall
Randomly in the location I was placed
Drifting out of nowhere - time, place were non existant
.

to be continued...

Feelin lonely is what everyone says
But thats how I really feel I guess
Today nothing or anything comes to mind
But the feeling of subtlety of whatever kind

I feel sad now a days but that's how it goes
So I stare at nothing but at the floor and my toes
Then again I've convinced myself right
I just stand there out of place, out of sight

Alot goes in there but never the courage to dump
As it feels like a goosebump or some kind of cramp
But I try my best to feel alright
Just then I poor out my heart at night

But whatever right...

Is there time to follow my heart
To find were to begin, were to start
Or have my emotions gone over me
To be blinded for what I must see?

My perspective, my point of view
Shapeshifts and morphs to a new
About how I see life as it progress upon my naked eyes
As to sight my eyes can no longer rise

Virginity

What does it mean when you lose your virginity? People say that actual intercource is a way to lose your virginity, anything that involves any penetration, except one from your own. The time when someone loses there virginity, the occasion can somtimes be moody and sentual, but in some it could be a disaster.

But why lose your virginity when you commit not losing it? In our society, sex is something that is forced into us, like pure-pressure. In one case a girl got dump because she did not answer the question "Condom or no condom?" Mostly girls are forced into this pressure because it is obvious that guys are the more sexually mentally active. Guys, in fact, think of sex every thirty sexonds, while gurlz imagine it every ten minutes.

Losing your virginity, it is crusial that you replace the environment with a more sentual and atmospheric mood in order to remove any buffs of negativity. I mean who would want to feel the awkward sensation after the first sex . In many cases, people have said their first sex was really horrible and awkward the fact that improper set of atmosphere was present. An example, was one guy having his first with a gurl, while his parents and grandparents were downstairs; the mixture of plessure and anxieties equals an unstable concoction .

Anytime that you lose your virginity, always remind yourself to set a mood that is issential for your love-making. But if you decide to be clean, it is good to understand that peer-pressure is associated with losing your virginity; that way you will be ready for any challenges that you stumble upon the road of your untarnished life.

My English Essay( comments are helpful )

duhhhhhhh.....

well, it's been boring. I have no school from january 9 to the end of this month, and i thought it would be fun coz well uno no school, but all i've been doing my whole break is sitting on my ass or sleeping. But anyways, during my break, i found out... well nothing actually; I've been thinking about it but nothing comes in mind, yup, .

Oh, Tom Cruise, according to scientology leaders, will become a great figure were everyone in the world will know him as a great being, kinda like jesus (as I hate to admit it). That's wierd huh. But that'a all ive got today. Maybe I'll learn more stuff by watching more MTV.

Well, keep rocking in the free world, peace out...

*****

everyone should download Faceboz Music Tool so everyone can see what evryone else is listening to.

DO people stare at you alot??

OK, everywehre i turn, i can see people looking at me; sometimes its alright coz i guess your getting some recognition, but at times i get so paranoid it stresses me out so bad. it feels like a piece of your freedom has been strip away, its like were ever i turn to look at something, in my periphiral view i could see at least one person looking at me, so the only place to stare at is the floor. Do you have the same problem as I do ??

JET or Wolfmother???

Which do you think is better???
